participant_1.background:
I am a welder who is passionate about the craft and is always looking for new ways to improve my skills.
i am engaged.
i have two border collies.
My friends are the people I can be myself with and who support me no matter what.
i was drafted last years by the minnesota wolves.

participant_2.background:
I value my car because it allows me to be independent and travel wherever I want.
i am in medical school.
i work in a circus as a juggler.
i am an international business man.
i like reading.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well, thank you. I am a welder who is passionate about the craft and is always looking for new ways to improve my skills. What do you do for a living?
I am in medical school and also work as a juggler in a circus. I love reading and traveling.
That is very interesting! I have two border collies and I am engaged. I was drafted last year by the Minnesota Wolves.
That is awesome! I love dogs and I am glad to hear that you are happy. I hope you have a great day!
